about.name: Singapore
about.info_text: Singapore, often referred to as the 'Lion City,' is a vibrant and modern island city-state located in Southeast Asia. Known for its stunning skyline, multicultural population, and clean streets, Singapore offers a unique blend of culture, history, and contemporary living. Visitors can explore the city's diverse neighborhoods, enjoy world-class cuisine, and experience attractions that range from lush gardens to cutting-edge technology.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 5.7 million
Country: Singapore
Time Zone: Singapore Standard Time (SGT, UTC+08:00)
Official Languages: English, Malay, Mandarin, Tamil
Currency: Singapore Dollar (SGD)

attractions_card.title: Marina Bay Sands
attractions_card.description: Marina Bay Sands is an iconic integrated resort known for its rooftop infinity pool, SkyPark, and stunning views of the city.

attractions_card.title: Gardens by the Bay
attractions_card.description: Gardens by the Bay is a futuristic garden featuring the Supertree Grove, Flower Dome, Cloud Forest, and lush greenery.

attractions_card.title: Sentosa Island
attractions_card.description: Sentosa Island is a resort destination with beautiful beaches, Universal Studios Singapore, Adventure Cove Waterpark, and more.

attractions_card.title: Singapore Zoo
attractions_card.description: The Singapore Zoo is a world-class wildlife park known for its open habitats and a diverse collection of animals.

attractions_card.title: Chinatown
attractions_card.description: Chinatown in Singapore offers a cultural experience with vibrant streets, temples, and delicious street food.

attractions_card.title: Little India
attractions_card.description: Little India is a lively neighborhood with colorful streets, Indian cuisine, and a rich cultural atmosphere.

attractions_card.title: Merlion Park
attractions_card.description: Merlion Park is home to the iconic Merlion statue, a symbol of Singapore, and offers scenic views of the waterfront.

attractions_card.title: National Museum of Singapore
attractions_card.description: The National Museum of Singapore showcases the country's history and culture through interactive exhibits and artifacts.

food_card.title: Hainanese Chicken Rice
food_card.description: Hainanese Chicken Rice is a beloved Singaporean dish featuring poached chicken, fragrant rice, and condiments.

food_card.title: Chilli Crab
food_card.description: Chilli Crab is a popular seafood dish with a spicy and savory sauce, best enjoyed with steamed buns.

food_card.title: Laksa
food_card.description: Laksa is a spicy noodle soup with a rich coconut-based broth, often served with prawns or chicken.

food_card.title: Satay
food_card.description: Satay consists of skewered and grilled meat served with a flavorful peanut sauce and rice cakes.

food_card.title: Roti Prata
food_card.description: Roti Prata is a South Indian-inspired flatbread served with curry, a common breakfast and snack item.

hotels_card.title: Marina Bay Sands Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Marina Bay Sands Hotel offers luxurious accommodations with unparalleled views and world-class amenities.

hotels_card.title: The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore
hotels_card.description: The Ritz-Carlton offers opulent rooms and top-notch service, located in the heart of Marina Bay.

hotels_card.title: Shangri-La Hotel, Singapore
hotels_card.description: Shangri-La Hotel in Singapore provides a serene escape with lush gardens, elegant rooms, and exceptional dining.

hotels_card.alt: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
hotels_card.title: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
hotels_card.description: Holiday Inn offers comfortable accommodations in the Orchard Road shopping district, ideal for leisure travelers.

hotels_card.title: Backpacker Hostels
hotels_card.description: Singapore offers a range of backpacker hostels for budget travelers, providing affordable dormitory-style rooms.

transport_card.title: Changi Airport
transport_card.description: Changi Airport (SIN) is one of the world's best airports, serving both domestic and international flights.

transport_card.title: MRT (Mass Rapid Transit)
transport_card.description: The MRT is Singapore's efficient subway system, offering easy access to various parts of the city and key attractions.

transport_card.title: Public Buses
transport_card.description: Singapore's extensive bus network complements the MRT system, making it convenient to explore the city.

transport_card.title: Taxis
transport_card.description: Taxis are readily available in Singapore and provide a comfortable way to travel, although they can be more expensive.
